events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the product is faulty and has several scratches on the surface.
System identified the customer's report as a Product Defect based on keywords like 'faulty' and 'scratches'.
The case was assigned to agent Sarah Thompson for further assistance regarding the reported product defect.
Hello, this is Sarah from customer support. I’m sorry to hear your product arrived damaged. I’m here to help.
Could you please send us photos showing the scratches and any damage so we can assess the issue better?
I have attached several pictures of the product defects. The scratches are very noticeable and disappointing.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement item sent at no extra cost or a full refund if you prefer.
I would prefer to get a replacement sent as soon as possible. Thank you for the quick response.
We have processed your replacement order, and it will be shipped within 24 hours with tracking information provided.
We hope your replacement product arrived in perfect condition. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Closing your support case as resolved. Thank you for your patience and cooperation throughout this process.
